name: Obstacle Maze Game
description:
Had a rough day at work or at school, play this maze to relieve your stress.

No sound, and No jumpscares, just relax and play this maze.

Use WASD to move the player. Use W and S to move the player forward and backwards and use A and D to rotate the player to move the player up and down.

Instructions!

W moves player forward

S moves player backwards

D rotates player forward

A rotates player backwards

Sorry the controls are a little hard and confusing but if you keep using the instructions, you will get the hang of it and beat my maze, good luck.
